means: 迅速而有效率的，迅速完成的

sentence.Network_en: The judge said that arbitration was a fair and expeditious decision-making process.
sentence.Network_cn: 法官说仲裁是公平且迅速有效的判决过程。

sentence.Network_en: They are almost as expeditious and effectual as Aladdin's lamp.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们几乎像如意神灯那么迅速有效.

sentence.Network_en: Ten days passed from the court's acceptance of the case to its resolution, expeditious remedy much appreciated by the American plaintiff.
sentence.Network_cn: 该案从受理到结案仅用10天时间,受到了美方当事人的好评.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... expedite v 加快，促进 expeditious a 迅速的 expedition n 远征，探险.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程|联想记忆法背单词... ... expedition n. 远征 expeditious adj. 迅速的，敏捷的 expenditure n. 花费，支出.

list.abs: the provision of effective and expeditious procedures for the multilateral prevention and settlement of disputes between governments ; and(D)以多边方式防止及解决政府间争端的有效及快速程序规定；
...(DC 20)1st(8/day)–寒霜之触,chill touch,(+36武器触碰,DC 19),脚底抹油,expeditious retreat,魔甲术,mage armor,护盾术,shield,克敌机先,true strike, 0.
sent the package by the most expeditious means ., 以最快速有效的方式送包裹.
sent the package by the most expeditious means ., 以最快速有效的方式送包裹.

example.ex: The judge said that arbitration was a fair and expeditious decision-making process.
example.tran: 法官说仲裁是公平且迅速有效的判决过程。

auth_sentence.content: Science relies on our products to provide expeditious answers to critical questions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Science relies on our products to provide expeditious answers to critical questions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Science relies on our products to provide expeditious answers to critical questions.

auth_sentence.content: No more expeditious way exists to reach that destination than by reforming deposit insurance.
auth_sentence.res_content: No more expeditious way exists to reach that destination than by reforming deposit insurance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No more expeditious way exists to reach that destination than by reforming deposit insurance.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =foot,表示"足,脚"; 2. =child/education,表示"儿童"; 3. 引申为"教育"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+ped足,脚+ient→能把脚跨出去→方便
expedite[v.使加速,促进]+ious……的→adj.迅速的,敏捷的
ped足,脚+estrian……的人→用脚走路的人
bi两+ped足,脚→n.两足动物
centi一百+ped足,脚+e→一百只脚的动物
ex出+ped足,脚+ient→能把脚跨出去→方便
expedite[v.使加速,促进]+ion→n.远征[队],探险[队]
impedi=impede[v.妨碍]+ment物→n.妨碍,阻碍物
ped足,脚+al→n.踏板 v.踩踏板,骑自行车
ped足,脚+estrian……的人→用脚走路的人
pod=ped足,脚+iatrist专家→n.足病医生
quadru四+ped足,脚→n.四足动物
ped教育+agog引导+y→引导教学→教学法
ped教育+ant人→受过教育的人→书呆子
pedant[n.迂腐之人,书呆子]+ry状态,性质→n.迂腐
ped儿童+istiatr专家,医生→n.儿科医师
ped儿童+ology学科→n.儿科学
ex出+ped足,脚+ite促成→把脚跨出去→加快
im进入+ped足,脚+e→把脚放进去→妨碍
ped足,脚+al→n.踏板 v.踩踏板,骑自行车
